typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(mymap = map(columnNames(),upper(#item)),
		myindex = mapIndex(columnNames(),#index),
		myreduce = reduce(columnNames(), 'myNewCol', #acc + #item, #result)) ~> DerivedColumn1
